S04vimkn_u:2_1: āmrapālīvane mahatā bhikṣusamghena sārdham aṣṭābhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:3_0: Vkn 1.2 sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasamyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:4_0: Vkn 1.3 dvātriṃśatā ca bodhisatvasahasrair abhijñānābhijñātaiḥ sarvair mahābhijñāparikarmaniryātaiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:4_1: buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitaiḥ, saddharmanagarapālaiḥ, saddharmaparigrāhakaiḥ, mahāsiṃhanādanādibhiḥ, daśadigvighuṣṭaśabdaiḥ, sarvasatvānadhyeṣitakalyāṇamitraiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:5_0: Vkn 1.4 tadyathā samadarśinā ca nāma bodhisatvena mahāsatvena samaviṣamadarśinā ca,
S04vimkn_u:5_1: samādhivikurvaṇarājena ca, dharmeśvareṇa ca, dharmaketunā ca, prabhāketunā ca, prabhāvyūhena ca, mahāvyūhena ca, ratnakūṭena ca, pratibhānakūṭena ca, ratnamudrāhastena ca, nityotkṣiptahastena ca, nityotpalakṛtahastena ca, nityotkaṇṭhitena ca, nityaprahasitapramuditendriyeṇa ca,
S04vimkn_u:5_2: prāmodyarājena ca, devarājena ca, praṇidhiprayātaprāptena ca, pratisaṃvitpraṇādaprāptena ca,

S04vimkn_u:6_1: anekāc caturmahādvīpakāl lokadhātor abhyāgatair bhagavato darśanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04vimkn_u:6_3: dvādaśa ca śakrasahasrāṇy anyānyebhyaś caturmahādvīpakebhyo 'bhyāgatāni tatraiva parṣadi saṃnipatitāny abhūvan /

S04vimkn_u:6_5: tathā catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhiksūṇyupāsakopāsikāś copasaṃkrāntā abhūvan /
S04vimkn_u:7_0: Vkn 1.6 tatra bhagavān anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:7_1: sumerur iva parvatarājaḥ sāgaramadhyād abhyudgataḥ sarvaparṣadam abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virocate śrīgarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇnaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:8_0: Vkn 1.7 atha ratnākaro bodhisatvo licchavikumāraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair licchavikumāraśataiḥ saptaratnamayāni cchatrāṇi gṛhītvā vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ niṣkramya yenāmrapālīvanaṃ yena ca bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:8_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathā parigṛhītais taiś chatrair bhagavantam abhicchādayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:9_0: Vkn 1.8 samantaraniḥsṛṣṭāni ca tāni ratnacchatrāṇy atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenaikaṃ mahāratnacchatraṃ saṃsthitam /
S04vimkn_u:9_1: tena ca mahāratnacchatreṇāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvaḥ saṃchāditaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:9_4: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravo mahāparvatarājā himavanmucilindamahāmucilindagandhamādanaratnaparvatā vā cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:9_5: te 'pi sarve tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04vimkn_u:9_6: ye 'pīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudrā vā sarastaḍāgāni vā nadīkunadyaḥ sravantyo vā pravahanti,
S04vimkn_u:9_7: tā api sarvās tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04vimkn_u:9_8: yāny apīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sūryācandramasāṃ vimānāni tārārūpāṇi vā devabhavanāni vā nāgabhavanāni vā yakṣabhavanāni vā gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragabhavanāni vā cāturmahārājabhavanāni vā grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānyo vā,
S04vimkn_u:9_9: tāny api sarvāṇi tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04vimkn_u:9_10: yāpi ca daśadiśi loke buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravartate,
S04vimkn_u:9_11: sāpi tasmād evaikamahāratnacchatrān niścarantī śrūyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:10_0: Vkn 1.9 tatra sā sarvā parṣad āścaryaprāptā bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā tathāgataṃ namasyatī sthitānimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇā /
S04vimkn_u:11_0: Vkn 1.10 atha khalu ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvaikāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhyaṣṭāvīt:
S04vimkn_u:12_3: amṛtaṃgamā ca varadharmakathā udārā sā sarva śrūyati ito gaganatalātaḥ // 2 //
S04vimkn_u:12_4: dharmeṇa te jitam idaṃ varadharmarājyaṃ dharmaṃ dhanaṃ ca dadase jagato jitāre /
S04vimkn_u:12_5: dharmaprabhedakuśalaṃ paramārthadarśin dharmeśvaraṃ śirasi vandami dharmarājam // 3 //
S04vimkn_u:12_6: na ca nāma asti na ca nāsti giraṃ prabhāṣi hetuṃ pratītya imi saṃbhavi sarvadharmāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:12_7: naivātra ātmana ca kāraku vedako vā na ca karmu naśyati śubham aśubhaṃ ca kiṃcit // 4 //
S04vimkn_u:12_8: māras tvayāstu vijitas sabalo munīndraḥ prāptā śivā amṛtaśāntavarāgrabodhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:12_9: yasminn avedita na cittamanaḥpracārā sarvakutīrthikagaṇāś ca na yānti gāhaṃ // 5 //
S04vimkn_u:12_10: cakraṃ ca te triparivarti bahuprakāraṃ prāvartitaṃ praśamanaṃ prakṛtīviśuddham /
S04vimkn_u:12_11: pratyakṣa devamanujādbhutadharmarājā ratnāni trīṇi upadarśita tatra kāle // 6 //
S04vimkn_u:12_12: ye tubhya dharmaratanena vinīta samyak teṣām akalpana punaḥ satate praśāntā /
S04vimkn_u:12_13: vaidyottamaṃ maraṇajātijarāntakāriṃ śirasā nato 'smi guṇasāgaram aprameyam // 7 //
S04vimkn_u:12_14: satkārasatkṛta na vedhasi merukalpa duḥśīlaśīlavati tulyagatādhimaitrī /
S04vimkn_u:12_15: gaganaprakāśamanase samatāvihārī ko nāma satvaratane 'smi na kuryu pūjām // 8 //
S04vimkn_u:12_16: samāgatā te janatā mahāmune mukham udīkṣanti prasannamānasā /
S04vimkn_u:12_17: sarve ca paśyanti jinaṃ purastāj jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 9 //
S04vimkn_u:12_18: ekāṃ ca vācaṃ bhagavān pramuñcase nānārutaṃ ca pariṣad vijānati /
S04vimkn_u:12_19: yathāsvakaṃ cārtha vijānate jano jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 10 //
S04vimkn_u:12_20: ekāya vācāya udīritāya vāsesi eke apare nividyasi /
S04vimkn_u:12_21: ākāṅkṣatāṃ kāṅkṣa śamesir nāyako jinasya āveṇikabuddhalakṣaṇam // 11 //
S04vimkn_u:12_22: vandāmi tvāṃ daśabala satyavikramaṃ vandāmi tvām abhayagataṃ viśāradam /
S04vimkn_u:12_23: dharmeṣu āveṇikaniścayaṃ gataṃ vandāmi tvāṃ sarvajagatpraṇāyakam // 12 //
S04vimkn_u:12_24: vandāmi samyojanabandhanacchidaṃ vandāmi tvāṃ pāragataṃ sthale sthitam /
S04vimkn_u:12_25: vandāmi khinnasya janasya tārakaṃ vandāmi saṃsāragatāv aniśritam // 13 //
S04vimkn_u:12_26: satvair samādhānagataṃ gatīgatam gatīṣu sarvāsu vimuktamānasam /
S04vimkn_u:12_27: jaleruhaṃ vā salile na lipyase niṣevitā te munipadma śūnyatā // 14 //
S04vimkn_u:12_28: vibhāvitā sarvanimitta sarvaśo na te kahiṃcit praṇidhāna vidyate /
S04vimkn_u:13_0: Vkn 1.11 atha ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavantam ābhir gāthābhir abhiṣṭutya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:13_1: imāni bhagavan pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni sarvāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāni /
S04vimkn_u:13_2: tāni cemāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ paripṛcchanti ḥ katamā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir iti /
S04vimkn_u:13_3: tat sādhu bhagavan deśayatu tathāgato 'mīṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim /
S04vimkn_u:14_0: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākarāya licchavikumārāya sādhukāram adāt:
S04vimkn_u:14_1: sādhu sādhu kumāra / sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kumāra yas tvaṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchasi /
S04vimkn_u:14_2: tena hi kumāra śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04vimkn_u:14_3: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya /
S04vimkn_u:15_0: sādhu bhagavann iti ratnākaro licchavikumāras tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:17_1: tat kasya hetoḥ / yāvantaṃ bodhisatvaḥ satveṣūpacayaṃ karoti tāvad buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
S04vimkn_u:17_2: yādṛśaḥ satvānāṃ vinayo bhavati tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti /
S04vimkn_u:17_3: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvā buddhajñānam avataranti tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhnāti /
S04vimkn_u:17_4: yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvānām āryākārāṇīndriyāṇy utpadyante tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti /
S04vimkn_u:17_5: tat kasya hetoḥ / satvārthanirjātaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetram /
S04vimkn_u:17_6: tadyathā ratnākara yādṛśam icched ākāśaṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ māpayeta,
S04vimkn_u:17_7: na cākāśaṃ śakyate māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
S04vimkn_u:17_8: evam eva ratnākara ākāśasamān sarvadharmāñ jñātvā /
S04vimkn_u:17_9: yādṛśam icched bodhisatvaḥ satvaparipākāya buddhakṣetraṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ māpayati,
S04vimkn_u:17_10: na ca buddhakṣetrākāśatā śakyaṃ māpayituṃ nāpy alaṃkartum /
S04vimkn_u:19_1: tasya bodhiprāptasyāśaṭhā amāyāvinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
S04vimkn_u:20_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalasaṃbhāropacitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:21_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśaladharmopasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
S04vimkn_u:22_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:23_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvaparityāginaḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:24_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvābhiprāyasaṃpannā daśakuśalakarmapathasaṃrakṣakāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:25_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya dvātriṃśallakṣanālaṃkṛtāḥ kṣāntidamaśamathapāramiprāptāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:26_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalaparyeṣṭiṣv ārabdhavīryāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:27_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya smṛtisaṃprajanyasamāhitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:28_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya samyaktvaniyatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:29_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāvihārinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:30_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvavimuktisaṃgṛhītāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:31_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvopāyamīmāṃsākuśalāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:34_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvāpāyasamucchinnam aṣṭākṣaṇavigataṃ buddhakṣetraṃ saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:35_0: svayaṃ śikṣāpadeṣu vartamānā parāpattyacodanatā bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram,
S04vimkn_u:36_1: tasya bodhiprāptasya niyatāyuṣo mahābhogā brahmacāriṇaḥ satyānuparivartinyā vācālaṃkṛtā madhuravacanā abhinnaparṣado bhinnasaṃdhānakuśalā īrṣyāvigatā avyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭisamanvāgatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:37_0: Vkn 1.14 iti hi kulaputra, yāvanto bodhisatvasya prayogās tāvanta āśayāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:38_0: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhisatvena svacittapariśodhane yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:38_1: tat kasya hetoḥ / yādṛśī bodhisatvasya cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati /
S04vimkn_u:39_1: yadi yādṛśī cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati,
S04vimkn_u:39_2: tan mā āhaiva bhagavataḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvacaryāṃ carataś cittam apariśuddhaṃ yenedaṃ buddhakṣetram evam apariśuddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:40_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:40_1: tat kiṃ manyase, śāriputra mā āhaiva sūryācandramasāv apariśuddhau yaj jātyandho na paśyati /
S04vimkn_u:41_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan jātyandhāparādha eṣa na sūryacandramasoḥ /
S04vimkn_u:42_0: āha: evam eva śāriputra satvānām ajñānāparādha eṣa yas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ kecit satvā na paśyanti,
S04vimkn_u:42_2: pariśuddhaṃ hi śāriputra tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yūyaṃ punar idaṃ na paśyatha /
S04vimkn_u:43_0: Vkn 1.16 atha khalu jaṭī brahmā sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:43_1: mā bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatasyāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetram idaṃ vyāhārṣīt /
S04vimkn_u:43_3: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra vaśavartināṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:43_4: īdṛśān vayaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paśyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:44_0: atha khalu sthaviraḥ śāriputro jaṭinaṃ brahmāṇam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:44_1: vayaṃ punar brahmann imāṃ mahāpṛthivīm utkūlanikūlāṃ kaṇṭakaprapātagiriśekharaśvabhragūthoḍigallapratipūrṇāṃ paśyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:45_0: jaṭī brahmāha: nūnaṃ bhadantaśāriputrasyotkūlanikūlaṃ cittam apariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayaṃ yenedṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyasi /
S04vimkn_u:45_1: ye punas te bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvāḥ sarvasatvasamacittāḥ pariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayās ta imaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ paśyanti /
S04vimkn_u:46_0: Vkn 1.17 atha bhagavān pādāṅguṣṭhena imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ parāhanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:46_1: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur anekaratnaśatasahasrasaṃcito 'nekaratnaśatasahasrapratyarpitaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:46_2: tadyathāpi nāma ratnavyūhasya tathāgatasyānantaguṇaratnavyūho lokadhātus tādṛśo 'yaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04vimkn_u:46_3: tatra sā sarvāvatī parṣad āścaryaprāptā ratnapadmaniṣaṇnam ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04vimkn_u:47_0: Vkn 1.18 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:48_0: āha: paśyāmi bhagavan adṛṣṭāśrutapūrvā ime vyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04vimkn_u:49_0: āha: īdṛśaṃ mama śāriputra sadā buddhakṣetram /

S04vimkn_u:208_0: Vkn 3.63 eṣā ca kathā pravṛttā, vimalakīrtir licchavir upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:208_1: sa mām evam āha: mā atra kulaputra śakrasaṃjñām utpādaya /
S04vimkn_u:208_2: māra eṣa pāpīyāṃs tava viheṭhanābhiprāya upasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:209_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:209_2: asmākam etāḥ kalpyante, na śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇām iti /
S04vimkn_u:210_0: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhītas trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:210_2: icchati cāntardhātum, na ca śaknoti sarvarddhim api darśayitvāntardhātum /
S04vimkn_u:210_4: niryātaya tvam etāḥ pāpīyan apsarasa etasmai satpuruṣāya,
S04vimkn_u:210_6: atha māro bhītas trasto 'kāmako 'smai tā apsaraso niryātayati /
S04vimkn_u:211_0: Vkn 3.64 pratigṛhya ca vimalakīrtis tā apsarasa etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:211_3: sa tāsāṃ tadānulomikīṃ bodhiparipācanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā bodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:212_0: sa tā evam āha: utpāditam idānīṃ yuṣmābhir bodhicittam,
S04vimkn_u:214_0: sa āha: buddhe 'bhedyaprasādaratiḥ, dharme śuśrūṣaṇaratiḥ, saṃgha upasthānaratiḥ, guruṣu gauravopasthānaratiḥ, traidhātukān niḥsaraṇaratiḥ, viṣayeṣv aniśritaratiḥ, skandheṣu vadhakānityapratyavekṣaṇāratiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:214_3: bodhicittārakṣaṇaratiḥ, satveṣu hitavastutāratiḥ, dāne saṃvibhāgaratiḥ, śīleṣv aśaithilyaratiḥ, kṣāntyāṃ kṣamadamaratiḥ, vīrye kuśalasamudānayanaratiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:214_5: bodhau vistīrṇaratiḥ, mārasya nigraharatiḥ, kleśānāṃ praghātanāratiḥ, buddhakṣetrasya viśodhanāratiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:214_9: nirvāṇārambaṇaratiḥ, bodhimaṇḍālaṃkāraratiḥ, na cākālaprāptiratiḥ, sabhāgajanasevanāratiḥ, viṣabhāgeṣv adoṣāpratighātaratiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:214_10: kalyāṇamitreṣu sevāratiḥ, pāpamitreṣu visarjanāratiḥ, dharmaprītiprāmodyaratiḥ, upāye saṃgraharatiḥ, apramādabodhipakṣyadharmasevanāratiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:215_0: Vkn 3.65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:216_0: tā evam āhuḥ: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye /
S04vimkn_u:217_0: atha māraḥ pāpīyān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:218_0: vimalakīrtir āha: avasṛṣṭā bhavantu / gaccha pāpīyan / sarvasatvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūryantām /
S04vimkn_u:219_0: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ: kathaṃ vayaṃ gṛhapate mārabhavane 'vatiṣṭhema /
S04vimkn_u:220_0: Vkn 3.66 āha: asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham /
S04vimkn_u:220_1: tatra pratipadyadhvam / tat punaḥ katamat / tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante /
S04vimkn_u:220_2: na ca tasya dīpasya parihāṇir bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:220_3: evam eva bhaginyaḥ eko bodhisatvo bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:220_4: na ca tasya bodhisatvasya cittasmṛtir hīyate,
S04vimkn_u:220_5: na parihīyate, uta ca vardhate / evaṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān yathā yathā pareṣām ārocayati deśayati,
S04vimkn_u:220_6: tathā tathā vivardhate sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:220_8: tatra yuṣmābhir mārabhavane sthitābhir aparimāṇānāṃ devaputrāṇām apsarasāṃ ca bodhicittaṃ rocayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:221_0: Vkn 3.67 atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrter licchaveḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ māreṇa prakrāntāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:221_2: yān ahaṃ nājñāsiṣam / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:222_0: Vkn 3.68 tatra bhagavān sudattaṃ śreṣṭhiputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:222_1: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:223_0: sudatto 'py āha: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:223_1: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan: svake paitṛke niveśane mahāyajñaṃ yajāmi /
S04vimkn_u:224_0: tatra saptame divase vimalakīrtir licchavis tāṃ mahāyajñaśālāṃ praviśya mām etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:224_1: na śreṣṭhiputra evaṃ yajño yaṣṭavyo yathā tvaṃ yajase /
S04vimkn_u:225_0: tam aham etad avocam: kathaṃ punar dharmayajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:227_1: ayaṃ dharmayajñaḥ / sa punaḥ katamaḥ / yad idaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtā mahāmaitrī,
S04vimkn_u:233_1: yatra dharmayajñe pratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā iṣṭayajñayājūkā dakṣiṇīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya /
S04vimkn_u:233_2: evaṃ hi bhagavan tasya gṛhapater nirdiśatas tasyā brāhmaṇaparṣado dvayor brāhmaṇaśatayor anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:234_0: Vkn 3.75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi /
S04vimkn_u:234_1: sa taiḥ muktāhāraṃ na pratigṛhṇāti sma /
S04vimkn_u:234_2: tam aham etad avocam: pratigṛhyemam, yatra te prasādo bhavati tasmai prayaccheti /
S04vimkn_u:235_1: eko bhāgo yas tatra yajñaśālāyāṃ sarvalokajugupsito nagaradaridras tasmai dattaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:235_2: dvitīyaś ca bhāgo duṣprasahāya tathāgatāya dattaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:235_3: yathā ca sarvā parṣat paśyati taṃ ca marīciṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ ca duṣprasahaṃ tathāgataṃ taṃ ca muktāhāraṃ duṣprasahasya mūrdhasaṃdhau muktāhārakūṭāgāraṃ prādurbhūtaṃ citraṃ darśanīyaṃ caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃbhāgaśaḥ suvibhaktam /
S04vimkn_u:236_0: Vkn 3.76 sa idaṃ prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśyemāṃ vācam abhāṣata:
S04vimkn_u:236_1: yasya dāyakasya dānapater yādṛśī tathāgate dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā tādṛśī nagaradaridre nirnānātvena samā,
S04vimkn_u:237_0: Vkn 3.77 tatrāsau nagaradaridra idaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S04vimkn_u:237_3: tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04vimkn_u:238_0: Vkn 3.78 iti hi sarve te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśanti sma,
S04vimkn_u:238_1: ye caiṣāṃ tena satpuruṣeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhārā abhūvan,
S04vimkn_u:240_0: Vkn 4.1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:240_1: gaccha tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:241_0: mañjuśrīr apy āha: kiṃ cāpi durāsado 'sau bhagavan vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ,
S04vimkn_u:241_10: upāyakauśalyagatiṃgataḥ, prāptapraśnaviniścayaḥ / sa na śakyo 'lpakena saṃnāhenābhirādhayitum /
S04vimkn_u:242_0: Vkn 4.2 atha tataḥ parṣadas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:242_2: yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sa ca satpuruṣa ubhau saṃlapiṣyataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:242_3: tatrāṣṭau ca bodhisatvasahasrāṇi pañcamātrāṇi ca śrāvakaśatāni saṃbahulāś ca śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ saṃbahulāni ca devaputraśatasahasrāṇi mañjuśriyam anubaddhāni dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04vimkn_u:242_4: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtas tair bodhisatvair mahāsatvais taiś ca śrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca parivṛto vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviśati sma /
S04vimkn_u:243_1: ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āgacchati mahatā parivāreṇa /
S04vimkn_u:243_2: yan nv ahaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛham adhitiṣṭheyam /
S04vimkn_u:243_3: tena taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam adhiṣṭhitam apagatadvārapālam /
S04vimkn_u:243_4: na tatra mañcā vā pīṭhā vāsanāni vā saṃdṛśyante 'nyatraikasmān mañcāt,
S04vimkn_u:243_6: Vkn 4.4 atha mañjuśrīḥ saparivāro yena vimalakīrter niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:243_7: upasaṃkramya praviśati sma / sa taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam apaśyad vigatadvārapālam /
S04vimkn_u:243_8: na cātra mañcān vā pīṭhān vāpaśyad anyatraikamañcāt,
S04vimkn_u:243_9: yatra vimalakīrtiḥ śayitaḥ / atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam adrākṣīt /
S04vimkn_u:243_10: dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha: svāgataṃ mañjuśriyo 'svāgataṃ mañjuśriyo 'nāgatasyādṛṣṭaśrutapūrvasya darśanam /
S04vimkn_u:244_0: mañjuśrir āha: evam etad gṛhapate yathā vadasi /
S04vimkn_u:244_1: ya āgato na sa bhūya āgamiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:244_2: yaś ca gato na sa bhūyo gamiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:244_3: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / na cāgatasyāgamanaṃ prajñāyate,
S04vimkn_u:244_4: na ca gatasya gamanam, yaś ca dṛṣṭo na bhūyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:245_0: Vkn 4.5 api tu kaccit te satpuruṣa kṣapaṇīyam,
S04vimkn_u:245_1: kaccid yāpanīyam, kaccid vātena pratikupyanti dhātavaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:245_4: alpātaṅkatāṃ cālpaglānyatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yatrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:246_0: Vkn 4.6 kutra te gṛhapate idaṃ vyādhisamutthānam /
S04vimkn_u:247_0: vimalakirtir āha: yāvacciram upādāya mañjuśrīḥ avidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca tāvacciram upādāya mamaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:247_1: yadā ca sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā mama vyādhiḥ praśrabdho bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:247_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / satvādhiṣṭhāno hi mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvasya saṃsāraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:247_3: saṃsāraniśritaś ca vyādhiḥ / yadā sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā bodhisatvo 'rogo bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:248_0: Vkn 4.7 tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ śreṣṭhina ekaputrako glāno bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:248_2: tāvac ca duḥkhitau bhavetāṃ yāvan nāsāv ekaputrakas tayor vigatavyādhiḥ syāt /
S04vimkn_u:248_5: satvārogyāt tv arogaḥ / yat punar mañjuśriḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kutaḥ samutthito vyādhir iti,
S04vimkn_u:249_0: Vkn 4.8 mañjuśrīr āha: śūnyaṃ te gṛhapate gṛham / na ca te kaścid upasthāyakaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:256_0: āha: yenāpi parikalpyeta tad api śūnyam / na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ parikalpayati /
S04vimkn_u:258_0: āha: śūnyatā mañjuśrīḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhyo dṛṣṭigatebhyo mārgitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:259_0: āha: dvāṣaṣṭiḥ punar dṛṣṭigatāni kuto mārgitavyāni /
S04vimkn_u:262_1: yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi ḥ kas ta upasthāyaka iti /
S04vimkn_u:262_3: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / mārā hi saṃsārasya varṇavādinaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:263_0: Vkn 4.9 mañjuśrīr āha: kidṛśo 'yaṃ te gṛhapate vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:265_0: āha: kim eṣa vyādhiḥ kāyasaṃprayukta uta cittasaṃprayuktaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:266_0: āha: na kāyasaṃprayuktaḥ kāyaviviktatayā / na cittasaṃprayukto māyādharmatayā cittasya /
S04vimkn_u:267_1: katame catvāraḥ, yad uta pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur iti /
S04vimkn_u:268_0: āha: ya evaṃ dhātuko mañjuśrīḥ sarvasatvānāṃ vyādhis tenāhaṃ vyādhitaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:269_0: Vkn 4.10 api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ bodhisatvena glānako bodhisatvaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:270_0: mañjuśrīr āha: kāyānityatayā na ca nirvidvirāgatayā,
S04vimkn_u:270_8: ādiviśuddhatayā, aparitarṣaṇatayā, sadāvīryāraṃbhāc ca, vaidyarājo bhaviṣyasi sarvavyādhīnāṃ śamayiteti /
S04vimkn_u:271_0: Vkn 4.11 mañjuśrīr āha: kathaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvena glānena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:272_0: vimalakīrtir āha: iha mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena glānenaivaṃ svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:272_2: na punar atra kaścit paramārthato dharma upalabhyate yasyaiṣa vyādhiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:272_4: na caiṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kaścit svāmī na samutthāpayitā /
S04vimkn_u:272_6: yo 'yaṃ vyādhir nāma nāyaṃ paramārthata upalabhyate,
S04vimkn_u:272_7: anyatrātmābhiniveśāt / uta nātmany abhiviniṣṭā vihariṣyāmo vyādhimūlaparijñātāvinaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:272_11: te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti /
S04vimkn_u:272_12: na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:272_13: na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:273_0: Vkn 4.12 tena dharmasaṃjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:273_2: viparyāsaś ca mahāvyādhiḥ / vigatavyādhikena ca mayā bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:273_7: yad idaṃ dvayavigamaḥ / tatra katamo dvayavigamaḥ, yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:273_10: katamā ca samatā / ātmasamatayā ca nirvāṇasamatā /
S04vimkn_u:273_11: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ubhe 'py ete śūnye, yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca / kenaite śūnye / nāmodāhāreṇaite śūnye / ubhāv apy etāv apariniṣpannau,
S04vimkn_u:273_12: yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca / tena samadarśinā nānyo vyādhir nānyā śūnyatā kartavyā /
S04vimkn_u:274_0: Vkn 4.13 aviditā ca sā vedanā veditavyā /
S04vimkn_u:274_3: na ca durgatyupapannānāṃ satvānām antike mahākaruṇā notpādayitavyā /
S04vimkn_u:274_4: tathā kariṣyāmo yathaiṣāṃ satvānām evam ayoniśonidhyaptyā vyādhim apaneṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:275_0: Vkn 4.14 na caiṣāṃ kaṃcid dharmam upaneṣyāmo nāpaneṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:275_1: yato nidānāc ca punar vyādhir utpadyate tasya parijñāyai tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:275_2: katamac ca punar nidānam, yad idam adhyālambananidānam /
S04vimkn_u:275_4: tāvad vyādhinidānam / kiṃ cādhyālambate, traidhātukam adhyālambate / tasyādhyālambanatayā kā parijñā,
S04vimkn_u:275_7: kiṃ ca nopalabhate, ubhe dṛṣṭī nopalabhate, yad idam ātmadṛṣṭiṃ paradṛṣṭiṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:275_8: tad ucyate 'nupalambha iti / evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇopapattiprahāṇāya /
S04vimkn_u:275_9: evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet,
S04vimkn_u:275_12: evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
S04vimkn_u:276_1: yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti /
S04vimkn_u:276_4: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:276_5: anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu /
S04vimkn_u:276_6: so 'yam upapadyate, na ca dṛṣṭiparyutthānaparyutthita upapadyate /
S04vimkn_u:276_7: so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate /
S04vimkn_u:276_8: sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum /
S04vimkn_u:276_9: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti nādaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate /
S04vimkn_u:276_10: yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam,
S04vimkn_u:277_0: Vkn 4.16 tatra katamo bandhaḥ, katamo mokṣaḥ / anupāyād bhavagatiparigraho bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ,

S04vimkn_u:279_4: iyam asya prajñā / yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati,
S04vimkn_u:280_0: Vkn 4.19 evaṃ hi mañjuśriḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:280_1: na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam /

S04vimkn_u:281_18: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ,

S04vimkn_u:282_0: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:284_2: ime ca mahāśrāvakāḥ / neha gṛha āsanāni saṃvidyante /
S04vimkn_u:285_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:287_0: Vkn 5.2 āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmarthiko bhavati,
S04vimkn_u:287_6: yo dharmārthikaḥ, na sa kāmadhāturupadhātvārūpyadhātvarthiko bhavati,
S04vimkn_u:288_0: Vkn 5.3 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthikaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:288_1: nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko na mārgabhāvanārthiko bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:288_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / aprapañco hi dharmo nirakṣaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:288_3: tatra yaḥ prapañcayati ḥ duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S04vimkn_u:288_4: nasau dharmārthikaḥ, prapañcārthiko 'sau / dharmo hi bhadantaśāriputra upaśāntaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:288_7: utpādavyayārthikās te / dharmo hy arajo rajo'pagataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:288_8: tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi,
S04vimkn_u:288_9: na te dharmārthikāḥ, rajo'rthikās te / dharmo hy aviṣayaḥ / ye viṣayasaṃkhyātāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, viṣayārthikās te / dharmo nāyūho niryūhaḥ / ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā,
S04vimkn_u:289_0: Vkn 5.4 dharmo 'nālayaḥ / ya ālayārāmāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, ālayārthikās te / dharmo nirnimittaḥ / yeṣāṃ nimittānusārivijñānam, na te dharmārthikāḥ, nimittārthikās te / dharmo 'saṃvāsaḥ / ye kecid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti,
S04vimkn_u:289_1: na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃvāsārthikās te / dharmo 'dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:290_1: ye saṃskṛtagocarāḥ, na te dharmārthikāḥ, saṃskṛtodgrahaṇārthikās te / tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:290_2: iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
S04vimkn_u:291_0: Vkn 5.6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:291_1: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetracārikāṃ carasi /
S04vimkn_u:291_2: tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛṣṭāni /
S04vimkn_u:291_3: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:291_4: asti kulaputra pūrve digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:291_5: tatra merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04vimkn_u:291_10: merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvagunopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:292_0: Vkn 5.7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma /
S04vimkn_u:292_2: yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupradīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni /
S04vimkn_u:292_3: tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca /
S04vimkn_u:292_4: tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakirter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:292_5: tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ saṃdṛśyate,
S04vimkn_u:292_7: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04vimkn_u:292_8: na jambūdvīpasya, na cāturdvīpikasyāvaraṇam / sarve te tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:293_0: Vkn 5.8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:293_1: niṣida tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:293_2: tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:294_0: atha ye 'bhijñāpratilabdhā bodhisatvās te dvācatvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasram ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nisīdanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:294_1: ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
S04vimkn_u:295_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:296_0: āha: na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhitāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:297_0: āha: tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kuru /
S04vimkn_u:298_0: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma /
S04vimkn_u:298_1: te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
S04vimkn_u:299_0: Vkn 5.9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakirtiṃ licchavim evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:299_1: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam uccāny evaṃ pragṛhītāni vicitrāṇi /
S04vimkn_u:299_2: na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04vimkn_u:299_6: tathaiva saṃdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04vimkn_u:300_0: Vkn 5.10 vimalakīrtir āha: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:300_1: yatrācintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet /
S04vimkn_u:300_3: na ca sumeruṃ hāpayet / tāṃ ca kriyām ādarśayet / na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:300_4: anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyuḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣṭam /
S04vimkn_u:300_5: ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya viṣayapraveśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:301_0: Vkn 5.11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:301_1: na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:301_2: na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet ḥ kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:301_3: sā ca kriyā prajñāyeta / na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:302_0: Vkn 5.12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:302_1: na ca satvā jānīran ḥ kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:302_2: kuto vāgatā iti / punar api cānāyya yathāsthānaṃ sthāpayet /
S04vimkn_u:303_0: Vkn 5.13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:303_2: tatrācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo 'pramāṇasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:303_3: saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:303_4: tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran I saṃkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ saṃjānīran /
S04vimkn_u:304_0: Vkn 5.14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre saṃdarśayati /
S04vimkn_u:304_1: sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāyikayarddhyā kramet /
S04vimkn_u:304_4: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante,
S04vimkn_u:304_6: yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāni ca,
S04vimkn_u:304_8: yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti,
S04vimkn_u:304_10: na cāsya kāyo vikīryeta / na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:305_0: Vkn 5.15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddahyante kalpoddāhena,
S04vimkn_u:305_1: tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:305_2: yac ca tena karma kartavyaṃ bhavet,
S04vimkn_u:305_3: tac ca kuryāt / yac cāvastād gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram,
S04vimkn_u:305_4: tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet /
S04vimkn_u:305_5: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
S04vimkn_u:306_0: Vkn 5.16 evam acṃtyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet /
S04vimkn_u:307_0: Vkn 5.17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:307_1: tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan,
S04vimkn_u:307_3: yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04vimkn_u:308_0: Vkn 5.18 ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ yatkiṃcinmātro viṣayāvatāranirdeśaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:308_1: api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśesaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam,
S04vimkn_u:309_0: Vkn 5.19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:309_1: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet /
S04vimkn_u:309_2: na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet /
S04vimkn_u:309_3: evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ /

S04vimkn_u:313_0: Vkn 6.1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat:

S04vimkn_u:350_0: Vkn 6.8 atha sā devatāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha:

S04vimkn_u:456_1: tatra gandhavyuhāhārā nāma devaputrā mahāyānasaṃprasthitās tasya bhagavatas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānām upasthānaparicaryāyā udyuktāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:456_2: tatra sā sarvā parṣat taṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyati taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān bhaktāgraniṣaṇnān /
S04vimkn_u:457_0: Vkn 9.3 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tān sarvān bodhisatvān āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:457_1: ko yuṣmākaṃ satpuruṣāḥ utsahate 'to buddhakṣetrād bhojanam ānetum /
S04vimkn_u:458_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:458_1: na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ paryapatrapasa īdṛśyā parṣadā /
S04vimkn_u:459_0: āha: nanūktaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenāśikṣito na paribhavitavya iti /
S04vimkn_u:460_0: Vkn 9.4 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir anuttiṣṭhann etataḥ śayanāt puratas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04vimkn_u:460_1: suvarṇavarṇena kāyena lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtena tasya tādṛśo rūpāvabhāso 'bhūd yena sā sarvā parṣad dhyāmīkṛtā bhavet /
S04vimkn_u:461_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ nirmitaṃ bodhisatvam evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:461_1: gaccha kulaputra ūrdhaṃdigbhāge dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya sarvagandhasugandho nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:461_4: tatra gatvā madvacanāt tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvaivaṃ vada ḥ vimalakīrtir licchavir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'lpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghutthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:461_5: evaṃ ca vadati ḥ dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ yat sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:461_6: eṣāṃ ca hīnādhimuktikanāṃ satvānam udārāṃ matiṃ rocayiṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:462_0: Vkn 9.5 atha sa nirmito bodhisatvo vimalakīrter licchaveḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ purata ūrdhamukhaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
S04vimkn_u:462_1: na cainaṃ te bodhisatvāḥ paśyanti gacchantam /
S04vimkn_u:463_0: atha sa nirmito bodhisatvas taṃ sarvagandhasugandhaṃ lokadhātum anuprāptaḥ /

S04vimkn_u:463_2: vimalakīrtir bhagavan bodhisatvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate /
S04vimkn_u:463_3: alpābādhatāṃ ca paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04vimkn_u:464_0: sa ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:464_1: dehi me bhagavan bhuktāvaśeṣaṃ bhojanaṃ yad idaṃ sahe lokadhātau buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:464_2: teṣāṃ hīnādhimuktānāṃ satvānām udāreṣu buddhadharmeṣu matiṃ rocayiṣyati /

S04vimkn_u:465_2: kva vā sa saho lokadhātuḥ, kaiṣā hīnādhimuktikatā nāma /

S04vimkn_u:466_0: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān evam āha:
S04vimkn_u:466_1: asti kulaputrāḥ adhodigbhāga ito buddhakṣetrād dvācatvāriṃśad gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya saho lokadhātuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:466_2: tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati hīnādhimuktikānāṃ satvānāṃ pañcakaṣāye buddhakṣetre /
S04vimkn_u:466_3: tatra vimalakīrtir nāma bodhisatvo 'cintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:466_4: tenaiṣa nirmito bodhisatvo 'nupreṣito mama nāmadheyaparikīrtanāyāsya ca lokadhātor varṇasaṃprakāśanāya teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ kuśalamūlottānatāyai /
S04vimkn_u:467_0: Vkn 9.7 atha te bodhisatvā evam āhuḥ:
S04vimkn_u:467_1: kiyan mahātmā sa bhagavan bodhisatvo yasyāyaṃ nirmita evam ṛddhibalavaiśāradyaprāptaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:468_0: sa bhagavān āha: tathā mahātmā sa bodhisatvo yat sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu nirmitān preṣayati /
S04vimkn_u:468_1: te ca nirmitā buddhakṛtyena satvānāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavanti /
S04vimkn_u:469_0: Vkn 9.8 atha sa bhagavān gandhottamakūṭas tathāgataḥ sarvagandhasamīhite bhājane taṃ sarvagandhaparivāsitaṃ bhojanaṃ tasmai bodhisatvāya prādāt /
S04vimkn_u:469_2: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan taṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāyaitaṃ ca vimalakīrtiṃ tāṃś ca bodhisatvān darśanāya /
S04vimkn_u:470_0: sa bhagavān āha: gacchata kulaputrāḥ yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyadhve /
S04vimkn_u:470_1: api tu gandhān kulaputrāḥ pratisaṃhṛtya taṃ lokadhātuṃ praviśata,
S04vimkn_u:470_3: svarūpaṃ ca pratisaṃharata, mā te sahe lokadhātau satvā madgubhūtā bhaveyuḥ /
S04vimkn_u:470_4: mā ca tasmin !okadhātau hīnasaṃjñām utpādya pratighasaṃjñām utpādayata /
S04vimkn_u:470_5: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ākāśakṣetrāṇi hi buddhakṣetrāṇi,
S04vimkn_u:470_6: satvaparipākāya tu buddhā bhagavanto na sarvaṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayanti /
S04vimkn_u:471_0: Vkn 9.9 atha nirmito bodhisatvas tad bhojanam ādāya sārdhaṃ tair navatyā bodhisatvasahasrair buddhānubhāvena vimalakīrtyadhiṣṭhānena ca tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena sarvagandhasugandhe lokadhātāv antarhito vimalakīrter licchaver gṛhe pratyaṣṭhāt /
S04vimkn_u:472_0: Vkn 9.10 tatra vimalakirtir navatisiṃhāsanasahasrāṇy adhitiṣṭhati yādṛśāny eva tāni prathamakāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04vimkn_u:472_2: sa ca nirmitas tad bhojanaparipūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ vimalakīrter licchaver upanāmayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:472_3: tasya bhojanasya gandhena sarvā vaiśālī mahānagarī nirdhūpitābhūd yāvat sāhasro lokadhātuḥ sugandhagandhīkṛto 'bhūt /
S04vimkn_u:472_4: tatra vaiśālakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ somacchatraś ca nāma licchavīnām adhipatis taṃ gandham āghrāyāścaryaprāpto 'dbhutaprāptaḥ prahlāditakāyacetāḥ sārdhaṃ paripūrṇaiś caturaśītyā licchavisahasraiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:472_5: tenaiva ca bhojanagandhena bhūmāvacarā devaputrāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devāḥ saṃcoditā vimalakīrter licchaver gṛham upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan /
S04vimkn_u:473_0: Vkn 9.11 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthaviraṃ śāriputraṃ tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:474_0: Vkn 9.12 tatra keṣāṃcic chrāvakāṇām etad abhavat:
S04vimkn_u:474_1: ita evaṃ parīttād bhojanāt katham iyam īdṛśī parṣat paribhokṣyata iti /
S04vimkn_u:475_0: tān sa nirmito bodhisatvaḥ śrāvakān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:475_1: mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ svaprajñāpuṇyais tathāgataprajñāpuṇyāni samīkārṣṭa /

S04vimkn_u:477_0: Vkn 9.14 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir jānann eva tān bhagavato gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatān bodhisatvān etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:478_0: ta evam āhuḥ: na sa tathāgato 'kṣaraniruktyā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04vimkn_u:478_1: tenaiva gandhena te bodhisatvā vinayaṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:478_2: yatra yatraiva gandhavṛkṣe te bodhisatvā niṣīdanti,
S04vimkn_u:478_3: tatas tatas tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti yat samanantarāghrāte gandhe sarvabodhisatvaguṇākaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhante yasya samādheḥ samanantarapratilambhāt sarveṣāṃ bodhisatvaguṇā jāyante /
S04vimkn_u:479_0: Vkn 9.15 atha te bodhisatvā vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocan:

S04vimkn_u:487_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūtas tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāyāṃ tathā dharmaṃ deśayato yathā paripūrṇasya prāṇisahasrasyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni,

S04vimkn_u:490_0: bhagavān āha: eṣa ānanda vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūto mahatyā parṣadā parivṛtau tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:491_0: Vkn 10.2 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:491_2: ime ca mahāsatvās tathāgataṃ drakṣyanti vandiṣyante ca /
S04vimkn_u:492_0: āha: gacchāma kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S04vimkn_u:493_0: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tādṛśam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S04vimkn_u:493_1: yathā tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ sārdhaṃ taiḥ siṃhāsanair dakṣiṇe pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:493_2: upasaṃkramya tāṃ parṣadaṃ dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:494_0: atha ye te bodhisatvā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrād āgatāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:494_1: te cānye ca tebhyaḥ siṃhāsanebhyo 'vatīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:494_2: evaṃ śakrabrahmalokapālā devaputrāś ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir vanditvaikānte pratyatiṣṭhan /
S04vimkn_u:495_0: atha sa bhagavāṃs tān bodhisatvān dharmyayā kathaya pratisaṃmodyaivam āha:
S04vimkn_u:497_0: Vkn 10.3 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:497_1: dṛṣṭaṃ te śāriputra eṣām agrasatvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ vikrīḍitam /
S04vimkn_u:499_0: bhagavān āha: tataḥ kā te saṃjñotpannā /
S04vimkn_u:500_0: āha: acintyā saṃjñā me bhagavan tatrodapadyata yathā cintayituṃ tulayituṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknomi tādṛśīṃ teṣām acintyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmi /
S04vimkn_u:501_0: Vkn 10.4 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:502_0: āha: eṣām eva ānanda bodhisatvānāṃ sarvaromakūpebhyo gandhaḥ kāyāt pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:503_0: śāriputro 'py āha: asmākam apy āyuṣmann ānanda sarvaromakūpebhya īdṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
S04vimkn_u:505_0: āha: vimalakīrtinā licchavinā gandhottamakūṭasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt sarvagandhasugandhāl lokadhātor bhojanam ānītam /

S04vimkn_u:559_1: te na jānanti na paśyanti ḥ kuto vayaṃ kriyāmaha iti /
S04vimkn_u:559_2: na hy abhiratyā lokadhātor imaṃ sahaṃ lokadhātuṃ praveśitāyā ūnatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:559_3: na cāsya lokadhātor utpīḍo na saṃbādhaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:560_0: Vkn 11.7 atha bhagavāñ śākyamunis tāṃ sarvāṃ parṣadam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:560_1: paśyata mārṣāḥ abhiratiṃ lokadhātum akṣobhyaṃ ca tathāgatam etāṃś ca kṣetravyūhāñ śrāvakavyūhān bodhisatvavyūhāṃś ca /
S04vimkn_u:562_0: āha: īdṛśaṃ mārsāḥ buddhakṣetraṃ parigrahītukāmena bodhisatvenākṣobhyasya tathāgatasya bodhisatvacaryāyām anuśikṣitavyam /
S04vimkn_u:563_0: asmin punar abhiratilokadhātusaṃdarśanarddhiprātihārye 'kṣobhyasya ca tathāgatasya saṃdarśane 'smin sahe lokadhātau caturdaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04vimkn_u:563_1: sarvaiś cābhiratyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānam utpāditam upapattaye /
S04vimkn_u:563_2: te sarve bhagavatā vyākṛtā abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye /
S04vimkn_u:563_3: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir yāvān iha sahe lokadhātau satvaparipākaḥ kartavyas taṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā punar eva tām abhiratiṃ lokadhātuṃ yathasthāne sthāpayamāsa /
S04vimkn_u:564_0: Vkn 11.8 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:564_1: dṛṣṭā te śāriputra abhiratir lokadhātuḥ sa cākṣobhyas tathagataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:565_0: āha: dṛṣṭā me bhagavan / sarvasatvānāṃ tādṛśā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā bhavantu /
S04vimkn_u:565_1: sarvasatvāś cedṛśyarddhyā samanvāgatā bhavantāṃ yādṛśyā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ kulaputraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:565_3: ye vayam īdṛśān satpuruṣān labhāmahe darśanāya /
S04vimkn_u:565_4: teṣam api satvānāṃ sulabdhā lābhā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:565_5: ya etarhi tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vemaṃ dharmaparyāyam antaśaḥ śroṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:565_6: kaḥ punar vādaḥ, ye śrutvādhimokṣyante pratyeṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanty adhimokṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti bhāvanāyogam anuyuktāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:566_7: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti satkariṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:566_11: ya ito dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ saṃvaram api parebhyo vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:566_12: tad eva teṣāṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ yeṣām iha dharmaparyāye kṣāntī rucir matiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭir adhimuktir muktiś ca bhaviṣyati /
S04vimkn_u:568_0: Vkn 12.1 atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:568_1: bahuni me bhagavan tathāgatasyāntikān mañjuśriyaś ca kumārabhūtasyāntikād dharmaparyāyaśatasahasrāṇi śrutāni /
S04vimkn_u:568_2: na ca me jātv evam acintyavimokṣavikurvitadharmanayapraveśaśrutapūrvo yādṛśa iha dharmaparyāye nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:569_0: Vkn 12.2 niḥsaṃśayaṃ te satvā evaṃ dharmabhājanā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:569_1: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S04vimkn_u:569_2: kaḥ punar vādaḥ / ye bhāvanāyogam anuyuktā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:569_3: pithitās teṣāṃ sarvāpāyāḥ, anāvṛtās teṣāṃ sarve sugatipathāḥ,
S04vimkn_u:569_4: dṛṣṭās te sarvabuddhaiḥ, nihatās taiḥ sarvaparapravādinaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:569_5: parājitās taiḥ sarvamārāḥ, viśodhitās tair bodhimārgāḥ, pratiṣṭhitās te bodhimaṇḍe, tathāgatagatisamavasaraṇās te bhaviṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:570_1: aham api bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmi sārdhaṃ sarvaparivāreṇa /
S04vimkn_u:570_2: yatra ca grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati deśayiṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S04vimkn_u:571_0: Vkn 12.4 evam ukte bhagavāñ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:571_1: sādhu sādhu devānam indra, subhāṣitaṃ te 'numodate tathāgataḥ /
S04vimkn_u:571_2: yā devānām indra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir iha dharmaparyāya uddiṣṭā /
S04vimkn_u:571_3: tasmād iha devendra atītānāgatapratyutpannās tena kulaputreṇa va kuladuhitrā vā buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhaviṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:571_4: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgrahīṣyaty antaśaḥ pustakalikhitam api kariṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati paryavāpsyati /
S04vimkn_u:572_0: Vkn 12.5 yaś ca punar devendra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatapūrṇaṃ tadyathāpi nāmekṣuvanaṃ vā naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vaivaṃ śālivanaṃ vā pratipūrṇaṃ kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā satkuryād gurukuryān mānayet pūjayet tāṃs tathāgatān sarvapūjābhiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:572_1: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānām ekaikasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇa ekaghanasyāvikopitasya śarīrasya sarvaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayec caturmahādvīpikalokadhātupramāṇaṃ yāvad brahmalokam uccaistvena yaṣṭicchatrapatākābhir udviddhopaśobhitam evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pratyekaṃ stūpaṃ kārayet,
S04vimkn_u:572_2: sa ca tatra kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā pūjāṃ kuryāt sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvadhvajapatākābhiḥ sarvatūryatāḍāvacarasaṃpravāditena pūjāṃ kuryāt,
S04vimkn_u:572_3: tat kiṃ manyase devānām indra api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tato nidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt /
S04vimkn_u:573_0: āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata, nāsya puṇyaskandhasya śakyaḥ paryanto 'dhigantuṃ kalpakoṭīśatasahasrair api /
S04vimkn_u:574_0: Vkn 12.6 bhagavān āha: ārocayāmi te devānām indra, prativedaya / ataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasunuyāt,
S04vimkn_u:574_1: ya imam acintyavimokṣanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyam udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt /
S04vimkn_u:574_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / dharmanirjātā hi devendra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:574_4: nāmiṣeṇa / tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
S04vimkn_u:575_0: Vkn 12.7 bhūtapūrvaṃ devānām indra atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye kalpe 'saṃkhyeyatare vipule 'pramāṇe 'cintye yad āsīt tena kālena tena samayena bhaisajyarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān mahāvyūhe lokadhātau viśodhane kalpe /
S04vimkn_u:575_1: tasya khalu punar devānām indra bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya viṃśatir antarakalpa āyuḥpramāṇam abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:575_4: tena ca devānām indra kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saptaratnasamanvāgataś caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
S04vimkn_u:575_5: paripūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasram abhūc chūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04vimkn_u:576_0: Vkn 12.8 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā ratnacchatreṇa sa bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgataḥ pañcāntarakalpān satkṛtaḥ saparivāraḥ sarvasukhopadhānena /
S04vimkn_u:576_1: iti hi devānām indra teṣāṃ pañcānām antarakalpānām atyayena sa rājā ratnacchatras tat putrasahasram āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:576_2: yat khalu mārṣāḥ jānīta, kṛtā mayā tathāgatasya pūjā, yūyam idānīṃ tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kuruta /
S04vimkn_u:576_3: iti hi devānām indra te rājakumārāḥ pitū rājño ratnacchatrasya ḥ sādhv iti pratiśrutya sarve sahitāḥ samagrā aparān pañcāntarakalpāṃs taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgataṃ satkurvanti sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ /
S04vimkn_u:577_0: Vkn 12.9 tataś caiko rājakumāraḥ somacchatro nāma /
S04vimkn_u:577_2: asti tv asyāḥ pujāyā anyodāratā viśiṣṭatarā pūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:578_0: tasyāntarīkṣād devatā buddhādhiṣṭhānenaivam āha: dharmapūjā satpuruṣa sarvapūjābhyo viśiṣyate /
S04vimkn_u:579_0: sa evam āha: katamā punaḥ sā dharmapūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:580_0: devatāha: etam eva tvaṃ satpuruṣa tathāgataṃ bhaiṣajyarājam upasaṃkramya paripṛccha ḥ katamā sā dharmapūjeti /
S04vimkn_u:581_0: atha devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāro yena bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04vimkn_u:581_1: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /
S04vimkn_u:581_2: ekāntasthitaś ca somacchatro rājakumāras taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyarājaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:582_0: Vkn 12.10 sa bhagavān āha: dharmapūjā kulaputra yā tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ gambhīrāvabhāsānāṃ sarvalokapratyanīkānāṃ duravagāhānāṃ durdṛśānāṃ duranubodhānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ nipuṇānāṃ nirupalambhānām bodhisatvapiṭakāntargatānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājamudrāmudritānām avivartacakrasūcakānām ṣaṭpāramitānirjātānāṃ saṃgṛhītagrahāṇāṃ bodhipakṣyadharmānugatānāṃ /
S04vimkn_u:583_0: Vkn 12.11 nirātmaniḥsatvanirjīvaniṣpudgalānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bodhimaṇḍāhārakāṇāṃ dharmacakrapravartakānāṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvasaṃstutapraśastānāṃ saddharmavaṃśānupaccherttṝṇāṃ dharmagañjasaṃdhārakānāṃ dharmāgrapūjāvatīrṇānāṃ sarvāryajanaparigṛhītānāṃ sarvabodhisatvacaryāpraśāsakānāṃ bhūtārthadharmapratisaṃcitāvatārāṇāṃ dharmoddānānityaduḥkhānātmaśāntanirjātānāṃ duḥśīlaujoghaṭṭakānāṃ sarvaparapravādikudṛṣṭyupalambhābhiniviṣṭatrāsakarāṇāṃ sarvabuddhapraśastānāṃ saṃsāravipakṣāṇāṃ nirvāṇasukhasaṃdarśakānām /
S04vimkn_u:583_1: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ yā deśanā saṃprakāśanā dhāraṇā pratyavekṣaṇā saddharmasaṃgrahaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:584_0: Vkn 12.12 punar aparaṃ kulaputra dharmapūjā yā dhārmeṣu dharmanidhyaptiḥ,
S04vimkn_u:584_1: dharmapratipattiḥ, pratītyasamutpādānulomatā, sarvāntadṛṣṭivigamaḥ, ajātānutpādakṣāntiḥ, nairātmyaniḥsatvatāvatāraḥ, hetupratyayāvirodhaḥ, avigrahaḥ, avivādaḥ, amamatvam, mamakāravigamaḥ, arthapratiśaraṇatā na vyañjanapratiśaraṇatā,
S04vimkn_u:585_0: Vkn 12.13 iti hi devānām indra sa somacchatro rājakumāras tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasyāntikād imāṃ dharmapūjāṃ śrutvānulomikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhate sma /
S04vimkn_u:585_1: yathāprāvṛtaiś ca vastrābharaṇais taṃ bhagavantaṃ chādayati,
S04vimkn_u:585_2: evaṃ vācam abhāṣat: ahaṃ bhagavan utsahe tathāgatasya saddharmaparigrahāya saddharmapūjākaraṇatāyai saddharmaṃ parirakṣitum /
S04vimkn_u:586_0: tasya sa tathāgato 'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā vyākṛtavān paścime kāle saddharmanagarapālarakṣāyai /
S04vimkn_u:587_0: Vkn 12.14 sa khalu punar devānām indra somacchatro rājakumāras tasya tathāgatasya tiṣṭhata eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ sann ārabdhavīryo viharati sma kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
S04vimkn_u:587_1: tenārabdhavīryeṇa kuśaladharmapratiṣṭhitena na cirāt pañcābhijñā utpāditāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:587_3: sa tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasyābhijñādhāraṇībalena paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpāṃs tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya pravṛttaṃ dharmacakram anuvartayati sma /
S04vimkn_u:587_4: tena khalu punar devānām indra somacchatreṇa bhikṣuṇā saddharmaparigrahābhiyuktena daśakoṭīśatāni satvānām avaivartikāni kṛtāny abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04vimkn_u:588_0: Vkn 12.15 syāt khalu punas te devānām indra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī,
S04vimkn_u:588_1: na khalu punas te devānām indra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04vimkn_u:588_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ratnārciḥ sa tathāgatas tena kālena tena samayena ratnacchatro nāma rājābhūc cakravartī /
S04vimkn_u:588_3: yat punas tad rājño ratnacchatrasya putrasahasram abhūt /
S04vimkn_u:588_5: yad iha bhadrakalpe paripūrṇaṃ buddhasahasram utpatsyate yataś catvāra utpannāḥ śeṣā utpatsyante,
S04vimkn_u:589_0: syāt khalu punas te devānām indra evam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūd yena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyarājasya tathāgatasya saddharmaḥ parigṛhīta iti /
S04vimkn_u:589_1: na khalu punas ta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04vimkn_u:589_2: tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena somacchatro nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
S04vimkn_u:589_3: tad anenāpi te devendra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam /
S04vimkn_u:589_4: yāvatyas tathāgatānāṃ pūjāḥ, dharmapūjā tāsām agryākhyāyate,
S04vimkn_u:589_5: jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā varā pravarā praṇītottarā niruttarākhyāyata iti /
S04vimkn_u:589_6: tasmād iha devānām indra dharmapūjayā māṃ pūjayata,
S04vimkn_u:590_0: Vkn 12.16 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:590_1: imāṃ te 'haṃ maitreya asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīsamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuparīndāmi,
S04vimkn_u:590_2: yathema evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyā yuṣmadadhiṣṭhānena parigraheṇa tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye jambūdvīpe vaistārikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04vimkn_u:590_3: nāntardhīyeran / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / bhaviṣyanti maitreya anāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāś cāvaropitakuśalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:590_4: te 'śravaṇād asya dharmaparyāyasya mā parihāsyanta iti /
S04vimkn_u:590_5: imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāñ śrutvātīva prema ca prasādaṃ ca pratilapsyante,
S04vimkn_u:590_7: teṣāṃ tvaṃ maitreya tathārūpāṇāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ cānurakṣāyā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntāṃs tasmin kāle vaistārikān kuryāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:591_0: Vkn 12.17 dve ime maitreya bodhisatvānāṃ mudre /
S04vimkn_u:591_5: ye punar imaṃ maitreya gambhīraṃ sūtrāntam arūpalepaṃ yamakavyatyastanihārapadapuṭaprabhedaṃ pravartayiṣyanti śrosyanty adhimokṣyante vedayiṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:592_0: Vkn 12.18 tatra maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_1: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_2: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām / aśrutapūrvāṃś ca gambhīrān sūtrāntāñ śrutvottrasyanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_3: saṃśayaprāptāś ca bhavanti, nānumodante / uttari ca pratikṣipante: ya ete 'smābhiḥ pūrvaṃ na śrutapūrvāḥ kuta ime 'dhunāgatāḥ /
S04vimkn_u:592_4: ye ca te kulaputrā gambhīradharmasūtrāntadhārakā gambhīradharmabhājanā gambhīradharmadeśayitāraḥ,
S04vimkn_u:592_5: tān na sevante na bhajante na paryupāsante,
S04vimkn_u:592_6: agauravāś ca teṣu bhavanti, antarāntarā ca teṣām avarṇam api niścārayanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_7: ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ātmānaṃ kṣiṇvanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_8: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nidhyaptiṃ gacchanti /
S04vimkn_u:592_9: Vkn 12.19 dvābhyāṃ maitreya kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
S04vimkn_u:592_11: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām / tāṃś cādikarmikān aciracaritān bodhisatvān avamanyate paribhavati na grāhayati na vivecayati nānuśāsti /
S04vimkn_u:592_12: tayaiva ca gambhīrādhimuktyā śikṣāyām agauravo bhavati /
S04vimkn_u:592_14: na dharmadānena / ābhyāṃ maitreya dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ gambhīrādhimuktiko bodhisatva ātmānaṃ kṣiṇoti /
S04vimkn_u:592_15: na ca kṣipram anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate /
S04vimkn_u:593_0: Vkn 12.20 evam ukte maitreyo bodhisatvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
S04vimkn_u:593_2: vayaṃ bhagavan etāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:593_3: imāṃ ca tathāgatasyāsaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ parirakṣiṣyāmo dhārayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:593_4: teṣāṃ cānāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ bhājanībhūtānām imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān hastagatān kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:593_5: smṛtiṃ caiṣām upasaṃhariṣyāmo yayā smṛtyemān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanty udgrahīṣyanti paryavāpsyanti dhārayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa deśayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:593_6: teṣāṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan upastambhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:593_7: ye ca khalu punar bhagavan tasmin kāla imān evaṃrupān sūtrāntān rocayiṣyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S04vimkn_u:593_8: veditavyam etad bhagavan maitreyasya bodhisatvasyādhiṣṭhānam iti /
S04vimkn_u:594_0: atha bhagavān maitreyasya bodhisatvasya sādhukāram adāt:
S04vimkn_u:594_1: sādhu sādhu maitreya, subhāṣitā ta iyaṃ vāk / anumodate tathāgato 'nujānāti ca subhāsitam /
S04vimkn_u:595_0: Vkn 12.21 atha te bodhisatvā ekasvareṇa vācam abhāṣanta:
S04vimkn_u:595_1: vayam api bhagavan tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānyonyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhya āgatyemāṃ tathāgatabuddhabodhiṃ vaistārikīṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:596_0: Vkn 12.22 atha catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantam etad avocan:
S04vimkn_u:596_1: yatra yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv ima evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ pracariṣyanti deśayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti,
S04vimkn_u:596_2: tatra tatra vayaṃ bhagavan catvāro mahārājāḥ sabalāḥ savāhanāḥ saparivārā dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:596_3: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya samantato yojanaśataṃ rakṣāṃ saṃvidhāṣyāmaḥ,
S04vimkn_u:596_4: yathā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya na kaścid avatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate /
S04vimkn_u:597_0: Vkn 12.23 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
S04vimkn_u:597_1: udgṛhāṇa tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāraya vācaya pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya /
S04vimkn_u:598_0: āha: udgṛhīto me bhagavan ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S04vimkn_u:599_0: bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ vimalakīrtinirdeśaṃ yamakapuṭavyatyastanihāram acintyadharmavimokṣaparivartam ity api dhārayemaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
S04vimkn_u:600_0: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśrīś ca kumārabhūta āyuṣmāṃś cānandas te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
S04vimkn_u:602_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04vimkn_u:602_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S04vimkn_u:603_0: deyadharmo 'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyino bhikṣuśīladhvajasya yad atra puṇyaṃ tad bhavatv ācāryopādhyāyamātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasatvarāśer anuttarajñānaphalāvāptaya iti /
